output_list.code: function transfer(address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) { _transfer(msg.sender, _to, _value); return true; }
output_list.reason: The transfer function does not check if the sender has enough balance to transfer. The transfer function will allow the transfer of more tokens than the sender has. This can be exploited to create a large amount of tokens in the contract. The transfer function should also check if the recipient is a contract. If it is, the transfer function should call a callback function in the recipient contract. This will allow the recipient to execute arbitrary code.
